title: Sepp Blatter | PBS News
snippet: Less than a week after a corruption scandal rocked the soccer world, FIFA president Sepp Blatter, who maintained he was the man to lead soccer's international governing body, has stepped down.

title: US drops bid to preserve FIFA bribery convictions | National | kpcnews.com
snippet: The case was one of several to emerge from a sweeping 2015 corruption probe by the US Department of Justice (DOJ), which ultimately led to the downfall of then-FIFA president Sepp Blatter.

title: Sepp Blatter and Michel Platini cleared of corruption by Swiss court
snippet: Tuesday's ruling is the second time the two men have been acquitted over payment made in 2011.

title: FIFA president Sepp Blatter announces resignation amidst corruption scandal | June 2, 2015 | HISTORY
snippet: On June 2, 2015, Sepp Blatter, president of international soccer’s governing body FIFA, steps down, just a few days after he had been re-elected to a fifth four-year term. His resignation came amid rumors that he would soon be under investigation ...
